alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf; Jackson; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 2:49PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN JACKSON... NORTHWESTERN GULF...EASTERN BAY...CALHOUN AND EASTERN WASHINGTON COUNTIES IN THE PANHANDLE OF FLORIDA THROUGH 330 PM EDT/230 PM CDT/... At 249 PM EDT/149 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 13 miles south of Marianna to 12 miles southwest of Blountstown to 8 miles northeast of Tyndall Air Force Base. This storm is nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Callaway, Chipley, Marianna, Springfield, Hiland Park, Tyndall Air Force Base, Bradford, Parker, Alford, Moose Pond, Clarksville, Abe Springs, Allanton, Dirego Park, College Station, Camps Head, Bennett, and Porter Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
